parameters.content: ## Itera por qualquer email recebido em uma das 4 caixas de e-mail da empresa.
## Retornar blacklist e compara com o texto dos emails recebidos

## Insere em uma lista os emails que ainda não estiverem na blacklist:
- Os emails encontrados aqui são emais que barraram o nosso envio e não devem ser contatados novamente.

json.text:
This is an aggregate DMARC report from Yahoo for your domain "contato-buscafornecedor.com.br".

This domain has a DMARC record set up. You are receiving this report because your email address is included in the 'rua' tag which is part of that DMARC record. DMARC is set up in the DNS settings of your domain.

If you have questions about DMARC, please refer to the DMARC.org website, or contact your email service or hosting provider.

If you no longer wish to receive these reports, or if you would like them to be sent to a different location, please update the 'rua' tag of the DMARC record of your domain. To do this please contact your email, domain or hosting provider. Please do not contact us as we will not be able to help you with updates to the DNS settings of your domain.

Please note that this email address is not monitored, and you will not receive a response if you reply to this email. For any feedback or questions, please reach out to dmarchelp@yahooinc.com.
json.textAsHtml:
This is an aggregate DMARC report from Yahoo for your domain "contato-buscafornecedor.com.br".

This domain has a DMARC record set up. You are receiving this report because your email address is included in the 'rua' tag which is part of that DMARC record. DMARC is set up in the DNS settings of your domain.

If you have questions about DMARC, please refer to the DMARC.org website, or contact your email service or hosting provider.

If you no longer wish to receive these reports, or if you would like them to be sent to a different location, please update the 'rua' tag of the DMARC record of your domain. To do this please contact your email, domain or hosting provider. Please do not contact us as we will not be able to help you with updates to the DNS settings of your domain.

Please note that this email address is not monitored, and you will not receive a response if you reply to this email. For any feedback or questions, please reach out to dmarchelp@yahooinc.com.
